remarks: Ring addition operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
statement:
dvafvadd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafvadd.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvadd.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvadd.v $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvavadd $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( F .+ G ) = ( F o. G ) ) $.
